name: Versus the Curse of Allautou
description:
You join a rock trio to play a huge party, one moonlit countryside night- and then, face occult mayhem.  Your game choices spin divergent destinies.

 What is Allautou, and whom does the demon possess? Stop her- risk possession- or run for your life?

Nearly two hours' game play, and even more when you compare twenty-four different endings. You can reach them all with a Choice click.

With dark humor, paths containing differing motivations for the characters, creepy secrets and hidden powers, danger with explanations reserved only for those who survive, it's you, Lue Cypher, and (in some threads, playable character) Kane Z, versus the curse....
